previewText: The last name is Rocannon. Our lands are east of here, encompassing the towns of New Laurel and Krindelton and extending up to Plover Pass.
benefit: You add a knowledge skill of your choice to your class skill list, and you gain a +2 bonus to checks with that skill.
flavor: You grew up as one of the best and brightest, having access to more training and more opportunity than anyone else around you. What sorts of esoteric activities—falconry, courtly intrigues, fine art—were you exposed to? What event set you on the adventurer’s path? How do you feel about those who didn’t have the privilege and opportunity you did?Good Background: Human.
name: Noble Scion
